title: The Oral History of 'Better Call Saul'
description:
Alan Siegel interviews the cast and creatives behind 'Better Call Saul' and discovers what it took to get the iconic show made. You can read the written version of this piece at theringer.com.
Host: Alan Siegel
Senior Producer: Steve Ahlman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
